name: Super Dumb Scientist
description:
Super Dumb Scientist

GLOBAL GAME JAM 2022 ENTRY

Super Dumb Scientist John Lilly completely destroy the world after failing yet another experiment...

This is him, dumber than ever, in his quest to come back in time to repair his mistake and eventually watch the last season of The Young And The Restless

Goal

Find stuff and try a lot of craft combinations until you manage to build the time machine. 

Controls

LEFT CLICK > Move / Harvest
RIGHT CLICK > Use / Consume 
SPACEBAR > Toggle help

Tips

Try the same actions while beeing dumb and while beeing smart

 Think smart, think dumb 

Credits

Paul "Aznoqmous" Landreau - Art & Code
Thomas "Howlite" Bittner - All Sound Design
Sébastien "Nerisma" Servouze - Code
